one_reviews_text: you need a massive room to even get started, nothing is explained in the tutorial exept how to place ship systems. not clear goal is set, just go out and get stuck in the never ending cold depths of space. the menu button dosnt even work, leaving you stuck in a ship with nothing to do except delete everything and eventualy die due to lack of oxygen, which is a better way to spend your day than playing this game.
review_feedback:
Hi,
We are sorry you didn't enjoy our game. To help you have a better experience you can use the no guardian option in the settings menu so you don't have to use a big room to play, you can even play seated if you wish by creating your own borders and just move around by teleporting using your controller :)

The main goal of our game is to defeat the hidden boss. In order to find him, you have to explore systems and it will add points to your Clue-O-Meter (on the left of the navigation panel). Once it is full, you can warp to the boss system and destroy his ship. It seems you have encountered a bug with the menu button, we will invistigate further and patch it as soon as possible as we are still in Alpha.

We hope you will give it another try and if you need any help, do not hesitate to contact us.
